scripts.make: npm run premake:macos && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge make --arch=universal
scripts.make:macos: npm run premake:macos && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge make --arch=universal
scripts.make:macos:dev: npm run premake:macos && cross-env-shell ENV=dev electron-forge make --arch=universal
scripts.make:macos:devprod: npm run premake:macos && cross-env-shell ENV=prod FLAVOUR=2 electron-forge make --arch=universal
scripts.make:win: npm run make:win:x64 && npm run make:win:ia32
scripts.make:win:x64: npm run premake:win && npm run rebuild:x64 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge make --arch=x64
scripts.make:win:ia32: npm run premake:win && npm run rebuild:ia32 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge make --arch=ia32
scripts.make:win:devprod: npm run make:win:devprod:x64 && npm run  make:win:devprod:ia32
scripts.make:win:devprod:x64: npm run premake:win &&  npm run rebuild:x64 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod FLAVOUR=2 electron-forge make --arch=x64
scripts.make:win:devprod:ia32: npm run premake:win &&  npm run rebuild:ia32 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod FLAVOUR=2 electron-forge make --arch=ia32
scripts.push:macos: npm run premake:macos && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge publish --arch=universal
scripts.push:win: npm run push:win:x64 && npm run push:win:ia32
scripts.push:win:x64: npm run premake:win && npm run rebuild:x64 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge publish --arch=x64
scripts.push:win:ia32: npm run premake:win && npm run rebuild:ia32 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod electron-forge publish --arch=ia32
scripts.push:macos:devprod: npm run premake:macos && cross-env-shell ENV=prod FLAVOUR=2 electron-forge publish --arch=universal
scripts.push:win:devprod: npm run push:win:devprod:x64 && npm run push:win:devprod:ia32
scripts.push:win:devprod:ia32: npm run premake:win && npm run rebuild:ia32 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod FLAVOUR=2 electron-forge publish --arch=ia32
scripts.push:win:devprod:x64: npm run premake:win && npm run rebuild:x64 && cross-env-shell ENV=prod FLAVOUR=2 electron-forge publish --arch=x64
scripts.rebuild:ia32: npm rebuild --arch=ia32 && cd ./node_modules/usb && node-gyp.cmd rebuild --arch=ia32 --verbose  && cd ../..
scripts.rebuild:x64: npm rebuild --arch=x64 && cd ./node_modules/usb && node-gyp.cmd rebuild --arch=x64 --verbose && cd ../..
